name: Tri-Valley Community Television/TV30
short_desc: Community-based public service nonprofit organization producing local cable television in Tri-Valley area
description: Produces local television programming for cable channels 28, 29 and 30. Invites the public to provide information for community service announcements. Functions as a community-based public service nonprofit organization. The station broadcasts to 68,000 households representing a population of nearly 200,000 people.
